parameters.name: search

AdExistsAdViewModel.title: AdViewModel
AdExistsAdViewModel.description: Ad If Already exists View Model

additionalProperties.description: Whatever you pass to request body will be present here under the same key, with the same value.

license_number.description: The license number must be exactly 10 digits long and must begin with 72.

description.example: This is a description of the ad.

license_number.description: The license number must be exactly 10 digits long and must begin with 72.

is_special.description: Is the ad marked as special?

is_story.description: Is the ad shown as a story?

images.description: Array of image files. Each image must be one of: jpeg, png, gif, svg, webp, bmp, tiff and max 5MB each.

video.description: Video file (mp4, avi, mpeg, mov). Max size: 50MB.
